playing.description: Set to true or false to pause or play the media.

loop.description: Set to true or false to loop the media.

controls.description: Set to true or false to display native player controls. Vimeo, Twitch and Wistia player will always display controls.

volume.description: Set the volume of the player, between 0 and 1.

source.description: The url of a video or song to play.

onReady.description: Called when media is loaded and ready to play. If playing is set to true, media will play immediately

onPlay.description: Called when media starts or resumes playing after pausing or buffering

onProgress.description: Callback containing played and loaded progress as a fraction ('{ played: 0.12, playedSeconds: 11.3, loaded: 0.34, loadedSeconds: 16.7 }')

onDuration.description: Callback containing duration of the media, in seconds

onSeek.description: Called when media seeks with seconds parameter

onError.description: Called when an error occurs whilst attempting to play media
